mapper.select: SELECT CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO, CHTT_ROOM_TY, CHTT_ROOM_NM, NVL(CR.LAST_MSSAGE_NO - CE.LAST_CNFIRM_NO, 0) as READ_COUNT, NVL(M.MSSAGE_CREAT_DT, CR.CHTT_CREAT_DT) AS CREAT_DE, M.MSSAGE_CN as LAST_MSG, M.MSSAGE_TY FROM CHAT_ROOM CR LEFT JOIN CHAT_EMP CE on (CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CE.CHTT_ROOM_NO) LEFT JOIN MESSAGE M ON (M.MSSAGE_SN = CR.LAST_MSSAGE_NO AND M.CHTT_ROOM_NO = CR.CHTT_ROOM_NO) WHERE CE.EMPL_NO = #{emplNo} ORDER BY CREAT_DE DESC

SELECT MSSAGE_SN, M.MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO, CHTT_ROOM_NO, MSSAGE_CN, M.MSSAGE_CREAT_DT, MSSAGE_TY, E.EMPL_NO, EMPL_NM FROM MESSAGE M LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (M.MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO = E.EMPL_NO) WHERE CHTT_ROOM_NO = #{chttRoomNo} ORDER BY MSSAGE_SN
